result.markdown: --- title: "" --- ## Week 6 ### Day 1 #### [Today]{style="color:red;"} - Lecture: Bayesian Inference - Lecture Code: bayesian.R #### [Assigned]{style="color:red;"} - Ellison 2004. - Background Reading (not required): - Hobbs and Hooten Ch5. - Fieberg Chapter 11. - Fieberg Chapter 12. ### Day 2 (lab) #### [Today]{style="color:red;"} - Lecture: Continue with: Bayesian Inference - Downloads: Files - Install R packages: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} # CRAN packages install.packages(c("rjags","bayesplot","rstanarm")) ``` ::: - Install External Software Program [JAGS](https://sourceforge.net/projects/mcmc-jags/files/) #### [Assigned]{style="color:red;"} - [Bayes Quiz on Canvas](https://colostate.instructure.com/courses/193678/quizzes) - Background Reading (not required): - [Kurz, 2023; Doing Bayesian Data Analysis in brms and the tidyverse](https://bookdown.org/content/3686/)
